caption.title: Monthly estimates of the basic reproductive number ( R 0) of mosquito-borne viruses similar to dengue, Zika, or chikungunya.
caption.p: We considered scenarios ranging from optimistic to very adverse (see parameter values for each scenario in Table 1) and used three times as many emerging females as observed in our study (i.e., 3 m instead of m; pink dotted line); the grey line corresponds to the worst-case scenario but with a higher value of the mean daily female mosquito death rate ( μ = 0.3 instead of 0.1) to approximate data from wild Ae. aegypti populations (see [ 34– 37]).
Click here for additional data file.
